Les mouvements des joueurs est spécial mais j'adore le réalisme du jeu, après c'est toujours pareil, il faut avoir une bonne machine pour que ce soit fluide !!!!!

The movements of the players is special but I love the realism of the game after it is always the same, you need a good machine to make it fluid!!

Почему заместо Етой игры у меня пишет Haif-life2??вы че ахуели?!

It has more mods and plugins than any other game i know.
If you just don't like it, its very easy to make it look like the game you want by just getting certain maps and skins. Also the game itself is easy to change, not just the looks but the mechanics itself by making yourself plugins. If you are not experienced in this, there is already big group of people dedicated to it. 
https://forums.alliedmods.net/  (plugins) and http://gamebanana.com/ (maps/skins)
But there are also servers in which you can just play the game as it is and try to get the highest rank.

CS:S is an old school FPS, CT's vs. T's (Counter-Terrorist's vs. Terrorist's) with all the game types its hard to get sick of this game. One of the first games I ever played/bought on steam. I'd call it an essential to your steam library! :)

Counter-Strike: Source has gotta be the best game ever! love the mods such as bunnyhop, surf and zombie, but the classic game mode is the best. One of my favorate maps has gotta be de_dust2 all up, but my favorate hostage map is definatly cs_assault because its very extreme because when you're the counter terrorist you have to try to raid the terrorist base and get the hostages or kill all the terrorist. But this is very great because i have had it for a very long time and i stopped at one stage and started but now ive started to enjoy the game, but i have never experienced what it is like to be an admin or an owner but i will like to start my own servers, and hope people will enjoy them. thankyou! sincerly MelonLord :melon:
